errors.maintenance: This page is under maintenance to better serve you. Please try again later or visit EarthquakeYardim.com.

footer.banner: Disclosure: We collect all calls for help from different sources such as Twitter, Instagram, Whatsapp and various websites and refine this data for use in the field. Helping NGOs and providing an open data platform in times of disaster.

site.depremyardim: The site we use to search and help earthquake victims.
site.afetbilgi: The website we use to get information on various disaster-related topics.
site.depremio: The site we use to help earthquake victims with supplies.
site.discord: The Discord server we use to develop our projects and communicate with each other.
